xmp_schema.description: $$$/xmp/xmpRights_description=This schema includes properties related to rights management. These properties specify information regarding the legal restrictions associated with a resource.
xmp_schema.label: $$$/xmp/xmpRights_label=Rights Management

xmp_property.name: Marked
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/xmpRights/Marked_description=Indicates that this is a rights-managed resource.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/xmpRights/Marked_label=Marked

xmp_property.name: Owner
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/xmpRights/Owner_description=An unordered array specifying the legal owner(s) of a resource.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/xmpRights/Owner_label=Owner

xmp_property.name: UsageTerms
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/xmpRights/UsageTerms_description=Text instructions on how a resource can be legally used.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/xmpRights/UsageTerms_label=Rights Usage Terms

xmp_property.name: WebStatement
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/xmpRights/WebStatement_description=The location of a web page describing the owner and/or rights statement for this resource.
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/xmpRights/WebStatement_label=Web Statement
